item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Sophie Kinsella
item.description: "sometimes you don't need a goal in life, you don't need to know the big picture. you just need to know what you're going to do next!" -- Sophie Kinsella

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Jennifer Weiner
item.description: "I think every person who is single should have a dog. I think the government should step in and intervene: If you're not married or coupled up, whether you've been dumped or divorced or widowed or whatever, they should require you to proceed immediately to the pound nearest you and select an animal companion." -- Jennifer Weiner

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Jennifer Weiner
item.description: "Cram your head with characters and stories. Abuse your library privileges. Never stop looking at the world, and never stop reading to find out what sense other people have made of it. If people give you a hard time and tell you to get your nose out of a book, tell them you're working. Tell them it's research. Tell them to pipe down and leave you alone." -- Jennifer Weiner

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Jennifer Weiner
item.description: "When I was five I learned to read. Books were a miracle to me - white pages, black ink, and new worlds and different friends in each one. To this day, I relish the feeling of cracking a binding for the first time, the anticipation of where I'll go and whom I'll meet inside." -- Jennifer Weiner

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Christopher Priest
item.description: "Every great magic trick consists of three parts or acts. The first part is called "The Pledge". The magician shows you something ordinary: a deck of cards, a bird or a man. He shows you this object. Perhaps he asks you to inspect it to see if it is indeed real, unaltered, normal. But of course... it probably isn't. The second act is called "The Turn". The magician takes the ordinary something and makes it do something extraordinary. Now you're looking for the secret... but you won't find it, because of course you're not really looking. You don't really want to know. You want to be fooled. But you wouldn't clap yet. Because making something disappear isn't enough; you have to bring it back. That's why every magic trick has a third act, the hardest part, the part we call "The Prestige"." -- Christopher Priest

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Michael Phelps
item.description: "You can't put a limit on aything. The more you dream, the father you get." -- Michael Phelps

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by jen lancaster
item.description: "I can't believe anyone would voluntarily run 26 miles. Sometimes I sit on the couch cross-legged because I don't feel like walking to the bathroom." -- jen lancaster

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Jen Lancaster
item.description:
"If you're anorexic, you're doing it wrong."
I swat him with a dish towel. "No, no, I mean anorexics look in the mirror, and even if they're eighty pounds, they still see a fat girl. I'm a hundred pounds heavier than I was in high school, my veins are full of creme fraiche, and yet I look in the mirror, take in the hair and makeup, and think, Damn, baby, you fiiine." -- Jen Lancaster

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Jen Lancaster
item.description: "I'm not lazy. I'm simply judicious about excess movement." -- Jen Lancaster

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "I solemnly swear that I am up to no good." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I finally understood what true love meant...love meant that you care for another person's happiness more than your own, no matter how painful the choices you face might be." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "So it's not gonna be easy. It's going to be really hard; we're gonna have to work at this everyday, but I want to do that because I want you. I want all of you, forever, everyday. You and me... everyday." -- Nicholas Sparks
